about_the_game:
Teamfight Manager has returned with more detailed tactics, management, and a new MOBA-style match system. Take charge of a virtual E-sports team, build the strongest team, and become the best coach!

· New Champions

Strategically utilize dozens of new champions alongside existing ones from Teamfight Manager. Many existing champions have received skill changes as well, so careful review will be essential for victory.

· Updated Map and Rules

The game map and rules have been changed. Now you must destroy the enemy's relic first to win on a MOBA-style map by properly combining top, jungle, bottom, and support positions. Show off your coaching abilities through more detailed team and individual tactics.

· Transfer System

Keep a close eye on solo rank matches and other teams' games to recruit outstanding players. Each player has vastly different abilities that significantly impact matches. Running your team efficiently is possible by negotiating to recruit good players at lower costs.

· Workshop

Create and enjoy new champions, teams, players, and even maps and tournaments through the Workshop. Every season can feel fresh and new.

Additionally, various content and improvements are prepared to help you immerse yourself as an E-sports team coach. During the Early Access period, we will continue to evolve into an even better game by providing new champions and content that reflects your feedback through regular updates.
